title: Las Vegas authorities: Man found in barrel in Lake Mead amid drought was shot; more bodies likely to turn up - USA TODAY
content:
1. Las Vegas authorities: Man found in barrel in Lake Mead amid drought was shot; more bodies likely to turn up  USA TODAY
  2. Las Vegas police: Body found in barrel at Lake Mead may have been there for decades  FOX5 Las Vegas
  3. Lake Mead's body in barrel is victim who was likely shot decades ago, Las Vegas police say  Fox News
  4. Police believe man found in barrel at Lake Mead died from gunshot wound  Las Vegas Review-Journal
  5. Low lake levels led to the discovery of a body, more could soon be found  ABC15 Arizona
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Authorities in Las Vegas say the human remains discovered in a barrel in Lake Mead was that of a man who'd been shot.
